2051790.name: Blacktop Hoops Demo
2051790.description: Blacktop Hoops is the world’s first competitive VR streetball game. Players can chain together flashy dribble tricks, shots, and high-flying dunks to finish off opponents the globe in epic games of 1-on-1 streetball. The game was designed with the most natural basketball mechanics ever built for virtual reality with intuitive dribbling, shooting, layups, and dunking. Play against dynamic mocap-driven AI recorded from pro streetball legends and dunkers. Ball out to an original 90s-inspired soundtrack with narration from legendary emcees Bobbito Garcia and WNBA legend Renee Montgomery. Unlock 30+ kicks from leading indie brands and shoe designers. Become the G.O.A.T.
